scenes.background: You offered to find someone else to help Monica. Bob overhears your conversation and remarks:
scenes.description: Isnt it your responsibility to handle your own tasks?

options.text: I see your point, but teamwork is about supporting each other.
options.analysis: You acknowledged Bob's concern and emphasized the importance of teamwork, showing good social skills and empathy.

options.text: Maybe, but I was on leave and couldn't manage it myself.
options.analysis: You explained your situation, showing self-regulation and motivation, but empathy and perception could be improved.

options.text: It's not just about tasks; it's about ensuring we all succeed.
options.analysis: You prioritized team success over individual tasks, demonstrating strong perception and empathy, but slightly lower motivation.
